title: IELTS Speaking Full Mock Exam 009
part1: How often do you spend time in nature?
Do you prefer parks, forests, or beaches?
Have you ever grown plants or vegetables?
Do you think people should spend more time outdoors?
Are there any environmental issues in your area?
How do you usually travel to natural places?

cueCard: Describe an environmental organisation or initiative you admire.
and explain why you find it admirable.

part3: Why do some people ignore environmental problems?
How can schools educate children about the environment?
Should companies be responsible for cleaning up pollution they create?
What environmental challenges do you think future generations will face?
